title: Stock Images
content: Hi, I was wondering where I could get some stock images in a bundle at an affortable price to get started with some collage-illustrations I have in mind... Human figures objects scenery the works? Any suggestions
author: MickM

comments.content:
I know there are some duplicates but here's my list:

[http://www.istockphoto.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/www.istockphoto.com/ "http://www.istockphoto.com/")

[http://www.photos.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/www.photos.com/ "http://www.photos.com/")

[http://www.imageafter.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/www.imageafter.com/ "http://www.imageafter.com/")

[http://www.sxc.hu/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/www.sxc.hu/ "http://www.sxc.hu/")

[http://www.bluevertigo.com.ar/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/www.bluevertigo.com.ar/ "http://www.bluevertigo.com.ar/")

[http://browse.deviantart.com/stockart/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/browse.deviantart.com/stockart/ "http://browse.deviantart.com/stockart/")

[http://www.veer.com/products/photography/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/www.veer.com/products/photography/ "http://www.veer.com/products/photography/")

[http://pro.corbis.com/splash.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20100824144735/http:/pro.corbis.com/splash.aspx "http://pro.corbis.com/splash.aspx")
